title: Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent - Message Execution Timeline
description: Provide timeline for a message being executed by the processing pipeline.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Execution Time Profiling of Journey Orchestration Component
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Captures the time taken by Journey Runtime in executing a message, for a given profile.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Execution Time Profiling of Message Execution Service
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Captures the time taken by Message Execution Service in personalisation, rendering and dispatching the message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Execution Time Profiling of Herald/Push Service
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Captures the time taken by Herald Service in processing the push packet and sending to end-service i.e FCM or APNS.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Execution Time Profiling of Streaming Delivery Service
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Captures the time taken by Streaming Delivery Service in processing the email packet and sending to ESS for dispatch.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Execution Time Profiling of Email Send Service
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Captures the time taken by Email Send Service(including Momentum) in processing the email packet and dispatching to ISPs.
